title: What is the best song to listen to when you lose your best friend? - Quora

response.answer_text: I have two. Pennywise - Bro Hymn To all my friends, present past and beyond Especially those who weren't with us too longLife is the most precious thing you can loseWhile you were here the fun was never endingLaugh a minute was only beginning Canton, Colvin, Nichols, this one's for you Ever get the feeling you can't go on Just remember whose side it is that you're on You've got friends with you till the end If you're ever in a tough situation We'll be there with no hesitation Brotherhood's our rule we cannot bend When you're feeling too close to the bottom You know who it is you can count on Someone will pick you up again We can conquer anything together All of us are bonded forever If I die you die that's the way it is To all my friends, present past and beyond To all those who weren't with us too longLife is the most precious thing you can loseWhile you were here the fun was never endingLaugh a minute was only the beginning Canton, Colvin, Nichols, this one's for you Bulldog Courage - Old Friends Die Hard People Come and Go Sometimes they gotta leave Can’t escape the Truth And that’s What I believe Hold onto your friends And to your memories That’s what loyalty Means That’s why I tell myself, “It’s all in the Cards” And old friends will always die hard The ones that go can never come back We suffer, that’s life, and it’s a cold hard fact I got the good times locked in my mind Couldn’t forget you if I even tried It’s hard. I miss you. I always get by Our brothers, Forever You’re two of a kind They broke the mold when they made your heart This world couldn’t tear you apart Forever True from the start Old Friends Die Hard I would spill my blood for you I would stand and die for you I would hold the knife for you I would trade my life for you﻿

I would suggest not to listen to any song at this stage . It will just make you nostalgic of the good times and you will eventually face chronic depression . The advice that I would like to give you go for jogging or running in the park . Interact with nature , watch the young kids playing , and you will feel good. Look , going through a fading friendship is one of the most difficult task ever I life more than those “love affairs”. . But still you want to listen to songs then go for khaabon ke parindey. Movie : Zindagi Na milengi dobara . It is a soothing one . I listen to this one actually had been listening since 7months (u know a fading friendship)…or photograph by ed Sheeran
